TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {30590=No Coloradan should make the mistake of paying the MSRP (sticker price) for a new Ford. TrueCar shows you the average price other people are actually paying for new cars at Carbondale Ford dealers. TrueCar compiles and analyzes recent Colorado sales transaction data which includes extensive exterior color, interior color, special packages, manufacturer and dealer installed options, and any manufacturer incentives for new 2015 Ford models. Many Colorado Ford buyers prefer options such as Bluetooth hands free, a navigation system, alloy wheels, leather seats, heated seats, a DVD player, an MP3 player, a backup camera, LED and Xenon lights. Using TrueCar, you can configure your preferred vehicle and communicate directly with new Colorado Ford dealers to get a great deal on a new Ford for the Carbondale area., 33475=There are currently no TrueCar Certified Dealers offering Guaranteed Savings on this 2015 Ford Taurus within 150 miles of Carbondale, CO., 30247=Live in or near Carbondale, CO and need to know what other people are paying for new vehicles? TrueCar provides you with actual prices paid by people around Carbondale for all new 2015 models.}
